|stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTA-273N |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2016 |fccapprovdate = 03/23/2011 |estreldate = 04/02/2011 |reldate = |estprice = |upc = 999900372365 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B004UAL5AU |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9220; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9223; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Gemtek WRTA-273N (WRTA-273N_V00) The RAM IC used may alternately be a '''SK hynix''' H5DU5162ETR-E3C. [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wzr-hp-ag300h On the OpenWrt wiki] ([http://wiki.openwrt.org/jp/toh/buffalo/wzr-hp-ag300h JP])
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=86839 On the DD-WRT forums]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Buffalo_WZR-HP-AG300H On the DD-WRT wiki] Per the OpenWrt wiki, the two wireless interfaces have PCI subsystems of 168c:a097 and 168c:a096. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31521-buffalo-wzr-hp-ag300h-reviewed On SmallNetBuilder]
[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833162047 On Newegg] (reviews)
[http://www.amazon.com/Buffalo-Technology-AirStation-Wireless-WZR-HP-AG300H/dp/B004UAL5AU On Amazon] (reviews) ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = wzr-hp-ag300h build 15962 20101224 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Buffalo_WZR-HP-AG300H Install Guide] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/buffalo/buffalo_wzr-hp-ag300h_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wzr-hp-ag300h |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
